title: Netflix’s Big Movie Year, ‘Jackass Forever,’ and the Five Greatest ‘Jackass’ Stunts of All Time
description:
Chris Ryan joins Sean to break down the new trailer for Netflix’s 2022 movie lineup (1:00), and then celebrate the new movie ‘Jackass Forever’ (14:00) and the greatest stunts in the history of the franchise (36:00).

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Chris Ryan
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
